archimate:Requirement.name: SG.1.2.7a: a) adopting an agile, business-oriented approach (i.e. forward-looking, dynamic, and flexible enough to scale in size and respond to business demands and challenges)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
